name: Pyjama-Boy was a clone
description:
NOTE: The music can be quite loud, so maybe lower your audio temporarily, and sorry for the inconvenience!

This is my entry for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3! The theme was Cycles and it got me thinking about repeating actions. It led to this short game about clones! Enjoy!

Controls Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move, jump with space, interact with E and enter doors with the up-arrow

Controls Xbox Gamepad:

Move with left joystick or d-pad, interact with X and enter doors with d-pad or left joystick up

Made with Game Maker Studio 2.
